text: Harold George Bryant Davenport (January 19, 1866 - August 9, 1949) was an American actor. His roles include Dr. Meade in Gone with the Wind (1939) and Grandpa in Meet Me in St. Louis (1944). ==References== Category:1866 births Category:1949 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American silent movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction
title: Harry Davenport (actor)
